positions.comment: Windchime rocking our way across Gulf of Carpentaria
Goodbye Darwin hello Cocos Keeling 1950nm to go.
Day 3 and 130nm west of Darwin No wind
Day 5 - wind 15-20  so nice sailing. 1700 to go
Day 7 smooth sailing in light winds. 500nm down 1500 to go
Day 8. Still smooth sailing. Blue sea and sky in the trade winds
Day 9  Another 100miles down the road
Day 11 Slow but smooth sailing. Reading mags about the future stops
Day 13 -   879M to go!  All well on Winchime
Day 15-   604M to go!  All well on Winchime
Day 17 Should be there on Wed. Well done the  Springboks
Day 18 Almost there with 228nm to go
We're Here!  Cocos Keeling 2095M later.
HURRAH!  Arrived Chagos safely 1583M.   Happy Birthday Brian.
HURRAH!  Arrived Chagos safely 1583M.   Happy Birthday Brian.
Enjoying Chagos. regretably will need to leave about 26/9
On route to Madagascar, 36 hours out, all well.
Crossing Saya Mala Bank by tomorrow. Winds still good 20knts and blue sky
Crossing Saya Mala Bank and the fishing lines are out
400nm to the Madagascar coast
235nm to the Mad coast .Flat sea and great sailing. Record 1012nm in 7 days
All Fine in Nosy Be
